trans-unit.source: The Somberwald has become a hunting ground for the Dronepack, the group of werewolves that have succumbed to the flesh-twisting power of Emrakul.
trans-unit.target: 屈从于伊莫库扭曲血肉之力的狼人集结成奴群，将松柏森当成猎场。

trans-unit.source: "A werewolf's howl is terrifying, to be sure. But this . . . this was a chilling sound I somehow felt. I fear what will reply to it."\n—Alena, trapper of Kessig
trans-unit.target: 「狼人的嚎叫确实令人丧胆。但这个. . .这个叫声让我不寒而栗。与之应和的东西很恐怖。」 ～凯锡革布陷人阿雷娜

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。每位牌手各失去1点生命。 在你的维持开始时，若每位牌手的总生命都为10或更少，转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: EMN·193 | Aurora of Emrakul | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I felt compelled to take the twisted stone, and I abandoned my horse's burden to accommodate its weight. Now, its continued glow illuminates my home and warms my mind."\n—Garner Kroft, Moorland farmer
trans-unit.target: 「有股力量驱使我带走那块奇形石头，我还得卸掉马上的货物才能载得动。如今，它持续闪耀的光芒照亮了我的家园，温暖了我的心灵。」 ～荒野农夫加纳克罗夫

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2.\nEquip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2。 佩带{3}（{3}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: The head of the staff doubles as a brand to anoint the newly inducted.
trans-unit.target: 法杖头另有用途，可替新进教众净身烙印。

trans-unit.source: Field Creeper
trans-unit.target: 骇野草人

trans-unit.source: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.
trans-unit.target: 它行于休耕田地，步态笨拙跳跃，头部嘎啦作响，谱成的旋律令人不寒而慄。

trans-unit.target: 你施放的生物咒语增加{1}来施放。

trans-unit.source: "It'll keep the crows away. Works on neighbors too."\n—Old Rutstein
trans-unit.target: 「它能吓走乌鸦；也能吓走邻人。」 ～老鲁斯登

trans-unit.source: "Ludevic saw it in a dream and set to work immediately, every detail already known. Can such genius be taught?"\n—Stitcher Geralf
trans-unit.target: 「卢德维梦见它后立即动手组装，每个细节都记得清清楚楚。这种天份那能教得来？」 ～拼接师基拉夫

trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that card except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. Put a black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield with power equal to that card's power and toughness equal to that card's toughness.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为该牌的复制品，但它是1/1，额外具有精怪此类别，且具有飞行异能。将一个黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场，其力量等同于该牌的力量，其防御力等同于该牌的防御力。
